hints.content:
The glass of chocolate milk is filled to $\goldE{275} \text{ mL}$.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A graduated cylinder labeled with tick marks from 50 milliliters to 300 milliliters. Tick marks 50, 100, 150, 200, 250, and 300 milliliters are labeled. 1 unlabeled tick mark is shown before 50 milliliters and 1 unlabeled tick mark is between every 2 labeled tick marks. The chocolate milk inside the graduated cylinder measures to the unlabeled tick mark above the 250 milliliters tick mark. A line extends from the unlabeled tick mark above the 250 milliliters tick mark and is labeled 275 milliliters. !

hints.content:
To find the amount of chocolate syrup Elina used, we subtract the number of $\text{mL}$ of milk $(\blueD{237} \text { mL})$ from the total number of $\text{mL}$ she has now $(\goldE {275}\text { mL})$.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: Two rectangles sit on top of each other. The top rectangle is labeled 275 milliliters. A curved bracket across the top rectangle is labeled Total milliliters of chocolate milk. The bottom rectangle is divided into 2 parts. The longer left part is labeled 237 milliliters. The shorter right part is labeled with a question mark. A curved bracket across the longer left part of the bottom rectangle is labeled Milk. A curved bracket across the shorter right part of the bottom rectangle is labeled Chocolate syrup. !

hints.content: Elina used $\greenD{38}\text { mL}$ of chocolate syrup to make her glass of chocolate milk.

question.content:
Elina has a glass of chocolate milk (shown below). She made it by mixing $237$ milliliters of milk with some chocolate syrup.  


[[☃ image 1]]

**How much chocolate syrup did Elina use to make her glass of chocolate milk?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] milliliters

options.alt: A graduated cylinder labeled with tick marks from 50 milliliters to 300 milliliters. Tick marks 50, 100, 150, 200, 250, and 300 milliliters are labeled. 1 unlabeled tick mark is shown before 50 milliliters and 1 unlabeled tick mark is between every 2 labeled tick marks. The chocolate milk inside the graduated cylinder measures to the unlabeled tick mark above the 250 milliliters tick mark. !
